title: Applicant address
question: What is your address?
explanation1: We will send the grant of probate to this address.

addressLine1.required: Enter address line 1, typically the building and street
addressLine1.invalid: Enter an address line that is 2-150 characters long

postTown.invalid: Enter a post town that is 2-50 characters long

newPostCode.invalid: Enter a postcode that is 2-14 characters long
